author: Rebekah Barnett
description:
Like the Marvel franchise, with its unlimited instalments and spin-offs, a new Covid scare campaign is underway, says Rebekah Barnett. And as with Marvel, its purpose is largely to create demand for merchandise.

The post New Covid Wave Scare Campaign a Massive Flop appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: New Covid Wave Scare Campaign a Massive Flop

author: Joanna Gray
description:
Joanna Gray says she was too kind to describe schools as institutionalised childcare. The reality is even worse. Often they're just a holding pen, or even a pre-custody suite.

The post I Was Too Kind Describing Schools as Institutionalised Childcare. The Reality is Even Worse appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: I Was Too Kind Describing Schools as Institutionalised Childcare. The Reality is Even Worse

author: Will Jones
description:
A leaked report of a medical test on boxer Imane Khelif from the 2023 World Championships has "proved" the women's Olympic champion is a biological male.

The post Leaked Medical Report “Proves” Olympic Boxer Imane Khelif “is a Biological Male” appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Leaked Medical Report “Proves” Olympic Boxer Imane Khelif “is a Biological Male”

author: Will Jones
description:
Hamit Coskun, the man who set fire to a copy of the Koran outside the Turkish Consulate, has been convicted of a racially aggravated public order offence. What happened to the freedom to protest against religion?

The post Hamit Coskun Convicted After Burning Koran in Public appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Hamit Coskun Convicted After Burning Koran in Public

author: Will Jones
description:
Right-wing candidate Karol Nawrocki has won Poland's Presidential election in a tight contest, beating pro-EU Rafal Trzaskowski with 50.89% of the vote in a heavy blow to PM Donald Tusk's liberalising Government.

The post Right-Wing Karol Nawrocki Wins Polish Presidential Election appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Right-Wing Karol Nawrocki Wins Polish Presidential Election

author: Chris Morrison
description:
The Daily Sceptic's Environment Editor Chris Morrison welcomes President Trump's new order calling for a more scientific approach for federally-funded science projects. Of course, woke scientists think it makes him Hitler.

The post Activist Scientists Rage About Trump’s Executive Order, Comparing Him to Hitler For Insisting That Federally-Funded Science Projects Are More Scientifically Rigorous appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Activist Scientists Rage About Trump’s Executive Order, Comparing Him to Hitler For Insisting That Federally-Funded Science Projects Are More Scientifically Rigorous

author: Laurie Wastell
description:
Lord Hermer, the Attorney General, didn't just sign off on the prosecution of Lucy Connolly, says Laurie Wastell. He also consented to the prosecution of Jamie Michael and Tyler Kay, both of whom were acquitted.

The post Hermer and Starmer Masquerade as Human Rights Laywers. But in Reality They’re Merciless Authoritarians appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Hermer and Starmer Masquerade as Human Rights Laywers. But in Reality They’re Merciless Authoritarians
